resources.string: I wolud like to volunteer for delivering food and receive notifications about food donation
Please select the location from where you would like to pick up the food
Please select the location where you want to deliver the foods from the list of charities below

iShare is a non-profitable organization runs by volunteers to share surplus things to the less fortunate people. Through the act we can reduce poverty index and number of children and aged people lives, who dies daily in hunger..
Are you sure about the pickup location and delivery location?
Unable to get data.Please try again
Thank you for being part of our volunteers to deliver the food
Your food donation has been accepted and our volunteer will pick it up shortly.
Your request to collect the foods from the donor is accepted.The details of the pick up and delivery locations are given bellow
